title: To amend section 7209 of the Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004, and for other purposes.
content: Northern Border Travel Facilitation Act - Amends the Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004 to direct the Secretaries of State and Homeland Security to establish a State Driver's License and Identification Card Enrollment Program to permit a US or Canadian citizen who produces a US or Canadian driver's license or identification card meeting requirements of this Act to enter the United States from Canada without providing any other documentation or evidence of citizenship. Requires Program implementation by December 31, 2009. Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security, prior to such implementation, to permit a US or Canadian citizen to enter the United States from Canada if the individual can demonstrate US or Canadian citizenship.
